snippet: Federal authorities said a circle of friends in Minneapolis’s Somali community had acted as recruiters for each other and had hoped to travel to Syria.
abstract: Federal officials announce arrests of Zacharia Yusuf Abdurahman, Adnan Farah, Hanad Mustafe Musse and Guled Ali Omar in Minneapolis and Abdirahman Yasin Daud and Mohamed Abdihamid Farah in San Diego for trying to join Islamic State; men are Somali-American and brainstormed together about how to enlist in group they idolized, form of radicalization that FBI is increasingly concerned about.
lead_paragraph: Federal authorities said a circle of friends in Minneapolis’s Somali community had acted as recruiters for each other and had hoped to travel to Syria.

headline.main: 6 Minnesotans Held in Plot to Join ISIS
headline.print_headline: 6 Minnesotans Held in Plot to Join ISIS

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
